content: half_double_crochet in each single_crochet to last single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch row 8-11 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in first stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch across to centre 3 half_double_crochet in centre stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch to last half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in last stitch row 12 chain 1 2 single_crochet in first half_double_crochet single_crochet in each half_double_crochet across to centre 3 single_crochet in centre stitch single_crochet in each half_double_crochet to last half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet in last stitch row 13 chain 1 single_crochet in first stitch chain 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 3 skip 2 single_crochet to centre chain 3 single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in centre stitch chain 3 single_crochet in next stitch chain 3 skip 2 single_crochet to last stitch chain 3 single_crochet in last stitch row 14-17 chain 1 single_crochet in first chain space chain 3 single_crochet in same space * chain 3 single_crochet in next chain space* to centre chain space single_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in centre space * chain 3 single_crochet in next chain space* to last chain space chain 3 single_crochet twice in last chain space repeat row 6-17 until shawl is desired size or you run out of yarn ending after row 9 three row of half_double_crochet finishing weave in ends block as desired to modify this pattern for a lacier or denser shawl as desired increase or decrease row 8-11 and/or 14-17 until you are satisfied with the resulting fabric questions/comments latining@gmail com
